short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist homepage extension with a todo list feature.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A minimalist new tab replacement with a todo list. This extension carries over default new tab features like the search bar, shortcuts, Google Apps, and Gmail access.

Features:
• Todo list with daily option that auto resets
• Light/Dark Mode
• Search Bar
• Shortcuts
• Google Apps

Upcoming features:
• Adding recently searched items to search suggestions
• Toasts (visual feedback for actions)
• Drag to rearrange todo list order
• Animations
